CustomField.description: For two column layouts, the Tab Key Order defines how tabbing through the section behaves. A Top-Down ordering first tabs down all the elements in the first column before returning to the top of the second column and tabbing down those elements. A Left-Right ordering tabs from the top-left element to the top-right element then down to the second row left element then to the second row right element, and so on.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Left-Right - tab right then down Top-Down - tab down then right
CustomField.label: Tab Key Order
